dialogues.speaker: ASH (narration)
dialogues.text: "I found part of Riven. It spoke like them. It felt like them."

dialogues.speaker: FLUX
dialogues.text: "Then this isn’t about surviving Erebus anymore, is it?"

dialogues.speaker: ASH
dialogues.text: "It’s about rescuing what’s real from what’s been rewritten."
New Objective: Locate next fragment in Emotional Conditioning Chamber
